data.message: This is cool but CD's though one of the best albums in my collection just wish it had more actual songs I guess if you add infinite, the slim shady EP and this you get a nice trilogy

replies.message: This is the Slim Shady LP. Add Marshall Mathers LP and now you're talkin'

Slim Shady EP was better than I could've ever imagine. Low Down & Dirty, Murder Murder, and No One's Iller were cool, but damn Just Don't Give a Fuck, and Just the Two of Us were a hell of a surprise the first time I heard them. I thought they were the same as on SSLP, but damn did they sound demented.
Yeah still need to cop that SSEP been after it for ages couldn't find the motherfucker everything else I have..... refuse to buy MMLP2 no point wasting money for like 5 decent songs
